channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light permanently out, 16th February
item.description:
At the bottom of Normal Terrace Swindon Road end near new builds. Lights been out since the building work began in summer 2025. Building work is now complete
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Pauls Street South, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 16th February
item.description:
Large potholes and one further down in 37/39 By drain cover

item.title: Drain leaking in the carpark it smells, 16th February
item.description:
It’s just before you get to the bottom of the carpark, a cars normally parked on it. It’s by the hedge near the bin shed down the bottom end
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishops Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole - church road - no white line, 16th February
item.description:
Church road, leckhampton. If travelling towards leckhampton road, go past farm lane and it is on the left hand side, near the field entrance and a speed slowing sign that is not in use. All of the road is broken up and on the pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pot hole, 16th February
item.description:
Just past bungalow driving towards Southam from Bishops Cleeve. Pot hole is on left side of road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 16th February
item.description:
Caller has concerns that the Tesco delivery lorries are blocking the temp traffic lights - they have suggested moving the lights towards the telephone box on the junction to Mersey road
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
